name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 30, on the Hangzhou subway, a middle-aged man sang "Without the Communist Party, There Would Be No New China" in the carriage and gave a speech, saying, "If anyone fights with the Communist Party again, I will kill him!"

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @XiaHuangxxx Well, the videos were all shot by our team in a Hollywood studio.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Where is the sincerity?
On July 29, Qiqihar No. 34 Middle School published a eulogy to commemorate the students who died.
However, some netizens found that in addition to the eulogy being a template, the only sentence in the entire eulogy was plagiarized.
This makes people wonder, can't No. 34 Middle School say a single sincere word to its deceased teachers and students?
The women's volleyball team of No. 34 Middle School has always won gold and silver medals for the school, and when the gymnasium collapsed during training, the school only thought about how to perfunctorily shirk responsibility, which is really chilling.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/H2Ii2MV7iP

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 31, Beijing was hit by heavy rain. In the on-site scenes in Mentougou District, the river water surged and rolled, the road was flooded and turned into a river. The short-term heavy rain triggered mountain torrents, washing away a large number of cars. Some people died at the scene and residents began to rescue themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 31, an explosion occurred in a restaurant along the street in Fuzhou

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, shops along the street have erected 8-meter-high walls.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 31, a netizen received a phone call from someone who threatened that he was forbidden to bring homosexuality-related flags to Zhang Huimei's Beijing concert, otherwise he would be notified to cancel his ticket.
He also accurately stated what was posted in what group at what time.
Currently, many netizens have submitted similar experiences in the background.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 30, it was reported online that Taoyuan County Party Secretary Pang Bo committed suicide by jumping into the river, presumably because the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection intervened in the investigation.
On July 31, People's Daily Online confirmed his death, saying that he died "due to illness."

content: On July 30, in Shigatse, Tibet, tourists were stopped by scenic area management staff while taking photos on the national highway, saying that they were prohibited from stopping to take photos without a ticket.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
About ten minutes ago, a netizen asked for help
Yushuyao Village, Zhangfang Town, Fangshan District, Beijing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Situation report
At 18:53 on the 31st, the Public Transportation Branch of the Guangzhou Public Security Bureau reported that at about 8:53 on the same day, the suspect Chen (male, 25 years old) threatened a passing woman with a portable fruit knife outside the security gate of Exit G of Yuangang Station on Guangzhou Metro Line 7.
After receiving the report, the Guangzhou police immediately activated the emergency response mechanism and quickly subdued the suspect at 8:55. No one was injured in the incident and the station operation order was not affected
At present, the suspect Chen has been criminally detained by the public security organs in accordance with the law. The case is under further investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hebei Town in Fangshan District, Beijing was severely affected. Due to the Internet and power outages, the news could not be spread, and many netizens said that they had not been able to contact their families for a day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Professional rescue organizations and volunteer organizations have established a Tencent document to facilitate everyone to publish real-time help information. As of now, there have been more than 130 cases of help in Beijing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Comparison of water potential at Dingjiatan in Mentougou, Beijing:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to online chat messages, Dingjiatan did not notify or organize evacuation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV News launched a live broadcast of the July 31 rainstorm in Beijing, but the camera was shooting the Bird's Nest and the Water Cube from the direction of Pangu Plaza, and could not show the real-time situation in Mentougou District and Fangshan District
